**Welcome to the highly anticipated launch week of AFFiNE 0.7.0 Preview!** We are thrilled to present an array of new features and a redesigned user experience to bring the knowledge closer to you and your collaborators.


On the second day of the AFFiNE 0.7.0 Preview launch week, we will introduce you to the exciting updates, including enhanced Docs & Text editing and the addition of PDF & PNG Export functionality. Get ready to unlock new levels of productivity and immerse yourself in a seamless and efficient workflow.



![tio605CdAeKqVuaxtFSIv9qkOyD4Jkz6073-hnjtvZM=](/blobs/tio605CdAeKqVuaxtFSIv9qkOyD4Jkz6073-hnjtvZM=)


# **Revolutionize Your Document Experience - Docs & Text editing**


## ① Bookmark - Quick Access to Related Webpage


The blue hyperlinks, while functional and efficient, have been around for decades and leave much to be desired in terms of aesthetics. Finally, we're excited to offer you the ability to effortlessly transform any link into a bookmark, allowing for substantial improvements in the clarity of information previews and rapid access to your saved web pages.



![cBxTEQZtUd-B5Q4d6R4YbeFr48t6Np1l2efsPtr_aZE=](/blobs/cBxTEQZtUd-B5Q4d6R4YbeFr48t6Np1l2efsPtr_aZE=)


## ② Tags - Enhance Content Organization and Discoverability


Too many pages? Now you can tag your content with descriptive labels, making it easier to find and access  whenever you need it.



![CgxJfxH0NgPs6vyUnGLDNyJXoZf9DNl8NYJwo5TZ25I=](/blobs/CgxJfxH0NgPs6vyUnGLDNyJXoZf9DNl8NYJwo5TZ25I=)


## ③ Backlinks - Seamless Connections with Other Pages


We know that navigating from page to page currently takes time, so here is what we offer. Seamless navigation through setup backlinks, and enhances content accessibility.



![0ZvMGNB3m1GojJ4VU21vNjIAwc9PAg-TsXR1dTJQDcg=](/blobs/0ZvMGNB3m1GojJ4VU21vNjIAwc9PAg-TsXR1dTJQDcg=)


# **Effortless Sharing and Versatility - PDF & PNG Export**


## ① Export to PDF - Share and Present with Ease


Now AFFiNE supports PDF export! It's super handy as it lets you save and share documents more easily.



![fQqamSP6xdvwVnW2MTSI2BdaUYRsc59K6nZPTYYTkUA=](/blobs/fQqamSP6xdvwVnW2MTSI2BdaUYRsc59K6nZPTYYTkUA=)


## ② Export to PNG - Showcase Stunning Visuals


Want something easier than sending a pdf? In addition to PDF export, you can simply choose any block on the edgeless, and copy it as a PNG image! Hope it can save you some time on finding another online snapshot(~~meme~~) editing tool.



![ccRhVoGAC2zki8aOJ_v76BoU1LYytimoNQofens8oJg=](/blobs/ccRhVoGAC2zki8aOJ_v76BoU1LYytimoNQofens8oJg=)


Rest assured, the AFFiNE 0.7.0 beta will be made available at a very recent date. Stay tuned for the official launch and get ready to experience a seamless and reliable note-taking solution.Get ready to unlock new levels of productivity
